default.prompt: high quality, sharp details, realistic, professional photography, 4k resolution, perfect lighting
default.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, ugly, bad anatomy, watermark, text, signature

strong.prompt: ultra realistic, 8k resolution, professional photo, sharp focus, cinematic lighting
strong.negative_prompt: blurry, noisy, grainy, distorted, jpeg artifacts, low resolution

subtle.prompt: slight quality improvement, natural look, maintain original details

color_correction.prompt: color correction, natural colors, balanced contrast, perfect exposure

object_specific.car: professional car photography, sharp details, clean vehicle, perfect lighting
object_specific.person: portrait photography, natural skin tones, sharp focus, professional lighting
object_specific.animal: wildlife photography, natural fur texture, sharp details, natural habitat

scene_specific.road: street photography, realistic road scene, natural lighting, sharp details
scene_specific.indoor: interior photography, balanced lighting, clean details, professional shot
scene_specific.nature: nature photography, vibrant colors, sharp details, natural lighting
